description: An intermediate bullet with an acceptable all-round performance.  Due to their role as UICA's standard issue rifle cartridge, these are ubiquitous wherever Earth makes its presence be known.

Civilian-legal 7.50mm ammunition featuring a reduced propellant case and unjacketed projectiles.  The 7.50mm RP round is extremely weak with very low stopping power, short range, and negligible recoil.  While cheaper than military grade rounds, it's only really useful for rifle training, and for hunting small animals.
